feed.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Bitcoin app bundle inclusion

entry.title: Combined summary - Fwd: Bitcoin app bundle inclusion
entry.summary: In this email conversation from June 27, 2011, Doug Huff is asking Laszlo if it's okay to include his Info.plist and BitcoinAppIcon.icns in the upstream source repository so that osx build can be automated without needing external source requirements. Doug is also inquiring whether Laszlo has licensed these items under MIT or a similar license, or if he would be willing to put them in the Public Domain or another compatible license. Laszlo responds that there isn't a license for these items, they are just public domain, and he was unsure where they belonged.
